title: 服务器总报错
txt_content:
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// There are four lights!

Time: 7/25/17 3:52 PM
Description: Exception in server tick loop

replies.author: sjx
replies.txt_content: 把启动脚本里 -XX:MaxPermSize= 后面的 128M 改大一些，比如 256M

replies.author: cc7w
replies.txt_content:
ic2找不到指定的类

尝试更新mod版本

replies.author: _DIM_
replies.txt_content:
http://jenkins.ic2.player.to/
尝试在这里下载最新版的装上
1710的我记得是用IC2_experimental
